title: Ways to Leave, Mute, and Delete Group Texts on Android

steps.title: Open Google Messages.
steps.content: Open Google Messages. Google Messages is the default text messaging app on most Android devices, including more recent Samsung Galaxy devices. It has a white icon with a blue speech bubble. Tap the Google Messages icon to open the app. Google Messages supports RCS features, including the ability to leave a group chat. If you are using the Samsung Messages app on a Samsung Galaxy phone, Samsung recommends you switch to Google Messages to get all RCS features. Samsung Messages has limited support for RCS messages. You can download and install Google Messages from the Google Play Store . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the group chat you want to leave.
steps.content: Tap the group chat you want to leave. This will open up the group text log. According to Traore, you can view the settings within a group text to see all the members and remove yourself.

steps.title: Tap the icon with three dots ⋮.
steps.content: Tap the icon with three dots ⋮ . It’s in the upper-right corner. This displays a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Group details.
steps.content: Tap Group details . It’s the second option from the top of the menu. This displays a menu that allows you to change details about the chat.

steps.title: Tap Leave group.
steps.content: Tap Leave group . It’s the last option in the box at the top. It’s next to an icon that resembles an arrow leaving through a door. If you don’t see this option, the group chat is probably an SMS-based chat. In which case, you cannot leave the group chat. The most you can do is delete the chat or mute it .

steps.title: Tap Ok.
steps.content: Tap Ok . This confirms that you want to leave the group text and removes you from the group.

steps.title: Open Google Messages.
steps.content: Open Google Messages. Google Messages is the default text messaging app on most Android devices, including more recent Samsung Galaxy devices. It has a white icon with a blue speech bubble. Tap the Google Messages icon to open the app. If you are using the Samsung Messages app on a Samsung Galaxy phone, Samsung recommends you switch to Google Messages to get all RCS features. However, you can still continue to use the Samsung Messages app to receive text messages for the time being. You can download and install Google Messages from the Google Play .

steps.title: Tap the group you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap the group you want to delete. Find the group message thread you want to delete on the list of your recent messages, and open it. You can’t remove yourself from a group SMS chat, but you can message the group admin and ask them to remove you from the group. If you are still using the Samsung Messages app, tap and hold the conversation you want to delete. Then tap Delete at the bottom of the screen. Then tap Move to trash to confirm you want to delete the conversation.

steps.title: Tap the ⋮ button.
steps.content: Tap the ⋮ button. This button is in the upper-right corner of your message conversation. It will open a drop-down menu. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Delete on the menu.
steps.content: Tap Delete on the menu. This option will delete the selected group conversation, and remove it from your Messages app. [3] X Research source If you're prompted to confirm your action, tap Delete to confirm and delete the group.

steps.title: Open Google Messages.
steps.content: Open Google Messages. Google Messages is the default text messaging app on most Android devices, including more recent Samsung Galaxy devices. It has a white icon with a blue speech bubble. Tap the Google Messages icon to open the app. If you are using the Samsung Messages app on a Samsung Galaxy phone, Samsung recommends you switch to Google Messages to get all RCS features. However, you can still continue to use the Samsung Messages app to receive text messages for the time being. You can download and install Google Messages from the Google Play .

steps.title: Tap the group you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap the group you want to delete. Find the group message thread you want to mute on the list of your recent messages, and open it. You can’t remove yourself from a group SMS chat, but you can mute it so you don’t receive notifications from the chat. If you are using the Samsung Messages app, tap and hold the conversation you want to mute. Then tap Notifications in the lower-left corner to toggle notifications on and off.

steps.title: Tap the ⋮ button.
steps.content: Tap the ⋮ button. This button is in the upper-right corner of your message conversation. It will open a drop-down menu. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Group details.
steps.content: Tap Group details . It’s the second option from the top of the menu. This displays a menu that allows you to change details about the chat.

steps.title: Tap Notifications.
steps.content: Tap Notifications . This displays your notification options for the chat.

steps.title: Tap Silent.
steps.content: Tap Silent . It’s the third option in the menu. This will block you from receiving notifications about the chat.

steps.title: Open WhatsApp.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp. WhatsApp is a messaging platform from Meta that allows you to send text messages , including group text messages , with end-to-end encryption. Tap the WhatsApp icon to open WhatsApp. You can download WhatsApp for free from the Google Play Store and register with your phone number.

steps.title: Tap the chat you want to leave.
steps.content: Tap the chat you want to leave. This displays the chat log. According to Traore, you can remove yourself from a group chat in the chat settings menu on WhatsApp as well as Google Messages.

steps.title: Tap the group name.
steps.content: Tap the group name. It’s at the top of the page. This displays information about the group, including options and members of the group.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Exit Group.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Exit Group . It’s at the bottom of the group info page. This displays a confirmation pop-up.

steps.title: Tap Exit.
steps.content: Tap Exit . This confirms you want to leave the group and removes you. [5] X Research source
